data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 28106, Version Hash: a92bafab1e85aa791728a9333fa9de4a600851a7
data.actual_result: You stay displayed as an online user to you and others. It also still shows the game you are playing.
data.expected_result: You are supposed to be displayed as offline and it should not show you are still playing a game.
data.short_description: XBOX Live connection makes you stay inside the online tab if you change your availability to invis while playing games
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord Canary (or Vanilla) If not already online- Change availability to online, dnd or away. - Turn on XBOX - Launch a game Change availability to invisible
